item.title: 박재범,Yultron - Forget About Tomorrow
item.description:
작곡: Yultron, 박재범 / 작사: C.., Yultron, 박재범
KY: 91416 / KY: 97238

These August skies
hot summer nights
I’m broken hearts
come brand new light
And in the dark
is where we’ll start
From the beach
to your bed
All of me is
what you’ll get
Girl
all night long
Let’s forget
about tomorrow
‘Cause we’re living
for tonight
Let’s forget
about tomorrow
‘Cause we drinking
all day
And we’re dancing
all night
Let’s forget
about tomorrow
‘Cause we’re living
for tonight
Let’s forget
about tomorrow
And just live it up
tonight

These autumn skies
to winter night
Keeps moving fast
‘cause time just flies
And
when I’m gone
Will you think
about us at all
Will you ever
fall in love as hard
Will you please
be strong
Let’s forget
about tomorrow
‘Cause we’re living
for tonight
Let’s forget
about tomorrow
Yeah we’re falling
in love
And we’re breaking
back up
Let’s forget
about tomorrow
‘Cause we’re living
for tonight
Let’s forget
about tomorrow
And just live it up
tonight

Let’s forget
about tomorrow
Let’s forget
about tomorrow
‘Cause we drinking
all day
And we’re dancing all
dancing all night
‘Cause we drinking
all day
And we’re dancing all
dancing all night
‘Cause we drinking
all day
And we’re dancing all
dancing all night
‘Cause we drinking
all day
And we’re dancing all
dancing all night
‘Cause we drinking
all day
And we’re dancing all
dancing all night
Dancing all night
dancing all night
Dancing all
dancing all night
Dancing all night
dancing all night
Dancing all
dancing all night
